name: Mauritz von Strachwitz
introduction: Mauritz von Strachwitz (born 21 July 1929) is a former German racing driver. He entered into the 1953 German Grand Prix in a privately entered Lancia and participated in one of the unofficial practice sessions for the event. However, he was not allowed to participate in the event because his driver's license had been confiscated prior to the race weekend due to a traffic accident.
